archimate:Device.name: Conference Room Projector (CRP)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Large conference rooms, boardrooms, and auditoriums • Presentations, video conferencing, and collaborative meetings
Specifications:
• Resolution: 4K UHD (3840x2160) or at least Full HD (1920x1080) • Brightness: 4,000 – 6,000 lumens (for well-lit rooms) • Contrast Ratio: 10,000:1 or higher (for clear image details) • Projection Technology: Laser or DLP (for sharp visuals and longevity) • Throw Ratio: 1.2 – 2.0 (for flexible placement in medium to large rooms) • Keystone Correction: 4-corner and vertical/horizontal adjustment • Connectivity Options: HDMI, DisplayPort, USB-C, Wi-Fi, Ethernet • Audio: Built-in speakers (10W+), external audio support • Mounting Options: Ceiling or table mount • Additional Features: Wireless screen sharing, remote control, interactive touchscreen capability ()
